name: Chaos Shooting Range
description:
This is a very small game, created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Try to hit as many targets as possible with the available objects.

Controls:

A: Walk left
D: Walk Right
E / Right Mouse: Pickup Item
Hold left Mouse Button to charge. Release to throw object.

Have fun!

Asset Packages used in this game:
Low Poly Pack - Environment Lite
RPGPP_LT
Stylized Environnement - Free Pack
